metadata.Title: CVE-2007-0255 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: XINE 0.99.4 allows user-assisted remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) and possibly execute arbitrary code via a certain M3U file that contains a long #EXTINF line and contains format string specifiers in an invalid udp:// URI, possibly a variant of CVE-2007-0017.

notes.Note: sbeattie> issue is unlisted on xine upstream website

criterions.comment: xine-ui package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
